Bring Your Customers
Pre-Conference Workshop @ IC '16
February 21st, 2016 (Sunday) from 08:00 AM onwards
at the Mandalay Bay Resort
 
BREAK OUT SESSIONS Check out our Technical Sessions at InterConnect '16 | Check it Out!!
 
 
In a consumer-centric world today’s Enterprises have to adapt to a faster paced IT model. Technologies like Node.js and REST APIs, which address the need for agility, scalability and flexibility, are taking front-stage. Digital is here to stay and those who don’t adapt are bound to fall behind! In this workshop, you will be taken through 4 labs over 6 hours in a completely guided hands-on approach with technologies like, JavaScript/JSON, Node.js, Loopback/Express, REST APIs, YAML/RAML/Swagger, Hybrid Mobile Apps, Dojo, IBM Bluemix and the Internet of Things!(Scroll Down to check the full agenda and register!)
 
Join us on February 21st, 2016 from 08:00 AM PST onwards for a Full-Day Hands-On Workshop covering the latest technologies in the Digital Transformation Journey. After the workshop join us to continue the learning at Open Technology Summit at the Mandalay Bay from 4 PM PST onwards!
 
Learn more about this awesome workshop here :)
 
 
 
6 Hours of Coding Guided Labs Focus on Digital Innovaaaation!
 
 
Also come by our booth(#402) during the Solution EXPO between February 22nd and 25th, 2016 and meet-and-greet with our technical experts to learn about IBM, Digital Transformation and the way forward! Learn more right here :)
